org.soulwing.confluence.cas
Class ConfluenceCasFilter

java.lang.Object
  edu.yale.its.tp.cas.client.filter.CASFilter
      org.soulwing.confluence.cas.ConfluenceCasFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class ConfluenceCasFilter
extends edu.yale.its.tp.cas.client.filter.CASFilter

Confluence subclass for CASFilter. Implements URL path exclusion, makes both Atlassian-user authentication and CAS authentication possible, and provides CAS global logout via the Confluence logout action.

Author:
Carl Harris

isBypassed

public static boolean isBypassed(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Determines whether the CASFilter has been bypassed for the specified request.

Parameters:
request - request to check for CAS bypass
Returns:
true if CAS has been bypassed for this request.
